name: Renew the supply
description:
collect the medkit to fix the medkit. thats the game... maybe...

my first game ever, made in a game jam themed 'renew' over the course of 6 hours.

further details of the game:

dive in as henry the stickman, collecting a medkit to fix another medkit. now that the other medkit is repaired, fix the medkit with the new medkit that you just repaired using the medkit thats now broken (indicated by the X in the medkit).

there is only one level in the game.... or is there?

enjoy and be sure to explore all the possibilities in the game :)

control:

left and right arrow keys: move left or right

up arrow key: jump
